title: Teapot And Cover, 1815–19
markings: Head, left profile (Rosenberg No. 6592); head, right profile (Rosenberg No. 6578), O, and lamp (Rosenberg 6772), ODIOT.
description: a) Teapot with  globular body on flaring foot. Leaf and dart relief around foot and on shoulder, laurel wreath around body, fluting around rim. Spout ending in lions head. Wooden handle set in leafy tubes. b) Flat cover with wooden finial. Engraved shield, crowned, of Borghese family.

tombstone.epitaph: Teapot And Cover, 1815–19. Silver gilt, and wood. 1946-76-1-a,b.
